knimeNode.name: Global bounding box of WKT geometries
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compute the envelope of all the WKT geometries of the input table

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the bounding box for all the entities of the input collection. Returns a collection containing only one line containing this geometry.
The actual computation is done by the powerful Geotools library.

ports.outPort: A table containing the global bounding box
